The following should be true for this to return true: 1. the time interval has passed between tournaments 2. there is at least 1 author eligible for reward 3. the contract has ETH (i.e. the Contract has received some payments) 4. (Implicit) the subscription is funded with LINK"},"_editComment(uint256,uint256,string)":{"details":"This function allows only the user who created a comment to edit it.","params":{"_commentId":"is the id of the comment of interest","_content":"is the new content of the comment","_postId":"is the id of the post which was commented"}},"changeUsername(uint256,string)":{"details":"this function allows a user to change thier nick name","params":{"_newNickName":"is the new nick name the user wishes to change to","_userId":"is the id of the user which is a unique number"}},"createComment(uint256,string)":{"details":"createComment enables registered users to comment on any post"},"createPost(string,string)":{"details":"This function allows only a registered user to create posts on the platform","params":{"_content":"is the content of the post by user","_imgHash":"is the hash of the image uploaded by the user"}},"deleteComment(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"This function allows only the user who created a comment to delete it. ","params":{"_commentId":"is the id of the comment of interest"}},"deletePost(uint256)":{"details":"A user should pay to delete post. The rationale is, to ensure users go through their content before posting since deleting of content is not free","params":{"_postId":"is the id of the post to be deleted"}},"downvote(uint256)":{"details":"This function allows a registered user to give a downvote to a post","params":{"_postId":"is the id of the post for which user wishes to give a downvote"}},"editComment(uint256,uint256,string)":{"details":"This function allows only the user who created a comment to edit it.","params":{"_commentId":"is the id of the comment of interest","_content":"is the new content of the comment"}},"editPost(uint256,string,string)":{"details":"This function allows only the owner of a post to edit their post","params":{"_content":"is the content of the post by user","_imgHash":"is the hash of the image uploaded by the user. This is optional ","_postId":"is the id of the post to be edited"}},"editUserProfile(uint256,string,string,string)":{"details":"this function allows a user to edit their profile","params":{"_bio":"is a short self introduction about the user","_newName":"is the new full name of the user","_profileImageHash":"is a hash of the profile image uploaded by the user","_userId":"is the id of the user which is a unique number"}},"getAddressFromUsername(string)":{"details":"function retrieves userAddress given username(i.e. nickname) of user","params":{"_username":"is the username or nick name of user"}},"getAllPosts()":{"details":"This function retrieves all post on the blockchain"},"getCommentByCommentId(uint256)":{"details":"function retrieves all information about a comment on a post given the postId and the commentId","params":{"_commentId":"is the id of the comment. "},"returns":{"_0":"function returns the comment corresponding to that postId and commentId"}},"getCommentLikersByPostIdAndCommentId(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"function retrieves all users that liked a comment on a post given the postId and the commentId","params":{"_commentId":"is the id of the comment. "},"returns":{"_0":"function returns an array of userAddresses that liked the  comment"}},"getCommentsByPostId(uint256)":{"details":"function retrieves all comments on a given post","params":{"_postId":"is the id of the post we want to retrieve its comments"},"returns":{"_0":"function returns an arry of all comments on the post"}},"getPostById(uint256)":{"details":"function retrieves all information on a post given the postId","params":{"_postId":"is the id of the post. The postId is unique"},"returns":{"_0":"function returns the post corresponding to that postId"}},"getRecentTrendingPosts()":{"details":"This function retrieves all recent trending posts on the platform. These are posts that have at least the minimum post score"},"getRecentWinningPosts()":{"details":"This function retrieves all recent winning posts on the platform"},"getUsdValueOfEthAmount(uint256)":{"details":"function receives quantity of ether and gives its value in USD"},"getUser(address)":{"details":"function retrieves user profile given the userAddress","params":{"_userAddress":"is the wallet address of user"},"returns":{"_0":"function returns the profile of the user"}},"getUserById(uint256)":{"details":"function retrieves user profile given the userId","params":{"_userId":"is the id of user. userId is unique"},"returns":{"_0":"function returns the profile of the user"}},"getUserComments(address)":{"details":"function retrieves all comments by a user given the userAddress","params":{"_userAddress":"is the wallet address of user"},"returns":{"_0":"function returns an arry of all comments by the user"}},"getUserNameFromAddress(address)":{"details":"function retrieves username(i.e. nickname) of user given the userAddress","params":{"_userAddress":"is the wallet address of user"}},"getUserPosts(address)":{"details":"function retrieves all posts by a user given the userAddress","params":{"_userAddress":"is the wallet address of user"},"returns":{"_0":"function returns an arry of all posts by the user"}},"getUsernameOfRecentWinners()":{"details":"This function retrieves the username of recent winners on the platform"},"likeComment(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"this function allows a registered user to like any comment","params":{"_commentId":"is the id of the comment in question"}},"registerUser(string,string)":{"details":"This function enables a user to be registered on ChainSphere","params":{"_fullNameOfUser":"is the full name of the User","_username":"is the user's nick name which must be unique. No two accounts are allowed to have the same nick name"}},"upvote(uint256)":{"details":"This function allows a registered user to give an upvote to a post","params":{"_postId":"is the id of the post for which user wishes to give an upvote"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"ChainSphere__NotCommentOwner()":[{"notice":"Errors ///"}],"ChainSphere__NotOwner()":[{"notice":"Errors ///"}],"ChainSphere__NotPostOwner()":[{"notice":"Errors ///"}],"ChainSphere__UsernameAlreadyTaken()":[{"notice":"Errors ///"}]},"events":{"CommentCreated(uint256,string,string,uint256)":{"notice":"Events ///"},"PostCreated(uint256,string)":{"notice":"Events ///"},"UserRegistered(uint256,address,string)":{"notice":"Events ///"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"changeUsername(uint256,string)":{"notice":"the function checks if the caller is the owner of the profile and if _newNickName is not registered on the platform yet"},"constructor":{"notice":"Constructor ///"},"createComment(uint256,string)":{"notice":"Since the postId is unique and can be mapped to author of the post, we only need the postId to uniquely reference any post in order to comment on it Because in any social media platform there are so much more comments than posts, we allow the commentId not to be unique in general. However, comment ids are unique relative to any given post. Our thought is that this will prevent overflow"},"deleteComment(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"the function checks if the caller is the owner of the comment and has paid the fee for deleting comment"},"deletePost(uint256)":{"notice":"The function checks if the user has paid the required fee for deleting post before proceeding with the action. To effect the payment functionality, we include a receive function to enable the smart contract receive ether. Also, we use Chainlink pricefeed to ensure ether is amount has the required usd equivalent"},"downvote(uint256)":{"notice":"no user should be able to vote for their post. No user should vote for the same post more than oncethe function increments the number of downvotes for the post by 1, sets the callers voting status for the post as true and emits event that post has received a downvote from the user"},"editUserProfile(uint256,string,string,string)":{"notice":"the function checks if the caller is registered and is the owner of the profile it is not mandatory for all parameters to be supplied before calling the function. If any parameter is not supplied, that portion of the user profile is not updated"},"getAddressFromUsername(string)":{"notice":"function returns wallet address of the user"},"getUserNameFromAddress(address)":{"notice":"function returns username(i.e. nickname) of the user"},"likeComment(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"the function increments the number of likes on the comment by 1 and adds user to an array of likers"},"upvote(uint256)":{"notice":"no user should be able to vote for their post. No user should vote for the same post more than oncethe function increments the number of upvotes for the post by 1, sets the callers voting status for the post as true and emits event that post has CheckUpkeep(bytes).details: This is the function that the Chainlink Automation nodes call to see if it's time to perform an upkeep. The following should be true for this to return true: 1. the time interval has passed between tournaments 2. there is at least 1 author eligible for reward 3. the contract has ETH (i.e. the Contract has received some payments) 4. (Implicit) the subscription is funded with LINK

_editComment(uint256,uint256,string).details: This function allows only the user who created a comment to edit it.

params._commentId: is the id of the comment of interest
params._content: is the new content of the comment
params._postId: is the id of the post which was commented

changeUsername(uint256,string).details: this function allows a user to change thier nick name

params._newNickName: is the new nick name the user wishes to change to
params._userId: is the id of the user which is a unique number

createComment(uint256,string).details: createComment enables registered users to comment on any post

createPost(string,string).details: This function allows only a registered user to create posts on the platform

params._content: is the content of the post by user
params._imgHash: is the hash of the image uploaded by the user

deleteComment(uint256,uint256).details: This function allows only the user who created a comment to delete it.

params._commentId: is the id of the comment of interest

deletePost(uint256).details: A user should pay to delete post. The rationale is, to ensure users go through their content before posting since deleting of content is not free

params._postId: is the id of the post to be deleted

downvote(uint256).details: This function allows a registered user to give a downvote to a post

params._postId: is the id of the post for which user wishes to give a downvote

editComment(uint256,uint256,string).details: This function allows only the user who created a comment to edit it.

params._commentId: is the id of the comment of interest
params._content: is the new content of the comment

editPost(uint256,string,string).details: This function allows only the owner of a post to edit their post

params._content: is the content of the post by user
params._imgHash: is the hash of the image uploaded by the user. This is optional
params._postId: is the id of the post to be edited

editUserProfile(uint256,string,string,st.details: this function allows a user to edit their profile

params._bio: is a short self introduction about the user
params._newName: is the new full name of the user
params._profileImageHash: is a hash of the profile image uploaded by the user
params._userId: is the id of the user which is a unique number

getAddressFromUsername(string).details: function retrieves userAddress given username(i.e. nickname) of user

params._username: is the username or nick name of user

getAllPosts().details: This function retrieves all post on the blockchain

getCommentByCommentId(uint256).details: function retrieves all information about a comment on a post given the postId and the commentId

params._commentId: is the id of the comment.

returns._0: function returns the comment corresponding to that postId and commentId

getCommentLikersByPostIdAndCommentId(uin.details: function retrieves all users that liked a comment on a post given the postId and the commentId

params._commentId: is the id of the comment.

returns._0: function returns an array of userAddresses that liked the  comment

getCommentsByPostId(uint256).details: function retrieves all comments on a given post

params._postId: is the id of the post we want to retrieve its comments

returns._0: function returns an arry of all comments on the post

getPostById(uint256).details: function retrieves all information on a post given the postId

params._postId: is the id of the post. The postId is unique

returns._0: function returns the post corresponding to that postId

getRecentTrendingPosts().details: This function retrieves all recent trending posts on the platform. These are posts that have at least the minimum post score

getRecentWinningPosts().details: This function retrieves all recent winning posts on the platform

getUsdValueOfEthAmount(uint256).details: function receives quantity of ether and gives its value in USD

getUser(address).details: function retrieves user profile given the userAddress

params._userAddress: is the wallet address of user

returns._0: function returns the profile of the user

getUserById(uint256).details: function retrieves user profile given the userId

params._userId: is the id of user. userId is unique

returns._0: function returns the profile of the user

getUserComments(address).details: function retrieves all comments by a user given the userAddress

params._userAddress: is the wallet address of user

returns._0: function returns an arry of all comments by the user

getUserNameFromAddress(address).details: function retrieves username(i.e. nickname) of user given the userAddress

params._userAddress: is the wallet address of user

getUserPosts(address).details: function retrieves all posts by a user given the userAddress

params._userAddress: is the wallet address of user

returns._0: function returns an arry of all posts by the user

getUsernameOfRecentWinners().details: This function retrieves the username of recent winners on the platform

likeComment(uint256,uint256).details: this function allows a registered user to like any comment

params._commentId: is the id of the comment in question

registerUser(string,string).details: This function enables a user to be registered on ChainSphere

params._fullNameOfUser: is the full name of the User
params._username: is the user's nick name which must be unique. No two accounts are allowed to have the same nick name

upvote(uint256).details: This function allows a registered user to give an upvote to a post

params._postId: is the id of the post for which user wishes to give an upvote

changeUsername(uint256,string).notice: the function checks if the caller is the owner of the profile and if _newNickName is not registered on the platform yet

createComment(uint256,string).notice: Since the postId is unique and can be mapped to author of the post, we only need the postId to uniquely reference any post in order to comment on it Because in any social media platform there are so much more comments than posts, we allow the commentId not to be unique in general. However, comment ids are unique relative to any given post. Our thought is that this will prevent overflow

deleteComment(uint256,uint256).notice: the function checks if the caller is the owner of the comment and has paid the fee for deleting comment

deletePost(uint256).notice: The function checks if the user has paid the required fee for deleting post before proceeding with the action. To effect the payment functionality, we include a receive function to enable the smart contract receive ether. Also, we use Chainlink pricefeed to ensure ether is amount has the required usd equivalent

downvote(uint256).notice: no user should be able to vote for their post. No user should vote for the same post more than oncethe function increments the number of downvotes for the post by 1, sets the callers voting status for the post as true and emits event that post has received a downvote from the user

editUserProfile(uint256,string,string,st.notice: the function checks if the caller is registered and is the owner of the profile it is not mandatory for all parameters to be supplied before calling the function. If any parameter is not supplied, that portion of the user profile is not updated

getAddressFromUsername(string).notice: function returns wallet address of the user

getUserNameFromAddress(address).notice: function returns username(i.e. nickname) of the user

likeComment(uint256,uint256).notice: the function increments the number of likes on the comment by 1 and adds user to an array of likers

upvote(uint256).notice: no user should be able to vote for their post. No user should vote for the same post more than oncethe function increments the number of upvotes for the post by 1, sets the callers voting status for the post as true and emits event that post has received an upvote from the user
